name: Pirate Island Mini Golf VR
description:
Pirate Island Mini Golf VR is a single player virtual reality experience set in a scenic tropical island. There are four, 18-hole courses placed throughout the old pirate stronghold, each with multiple challenges and enhancements that can be unlocked and mix up game play to keep you coming back for more.

So come to Pirate Island! Tune in the radio to a music style of your choice and play a couple rounds. Take a swim in the ocean to find hidden, unique sea shells that unlock new content, or just watch the fireflies come out as the sun sets over the horizon.

Pirate Island Mini Golf VR - Coming soon and only available on Steam.
